title: Navri Mile Navryala
overview: Navri Mile Navryala is a classic Marathi comedy film directed by Sachin Pilgaonkar. The story revolves around mistaken identities and humorous situations that arise as a young man tries to find a suitable bride. Packed with lighthearted romance, witty dialogues, and entertaining performances, the film showcases the charm of 1980s Marathi cinema and remains a favourite among fans of the genre.
